properties.name: app.upload.dir
properties.description: Relative or absolute directory where uploaded files are stored when not using Cloudinary.

properties.name: app.upload.url
properties.description: Public URL prefix that maps to the upload directory for serving files.

properties.name: app.pos.guest-customer-id
properties.description: Default customer id used for POS guest orders when a customer is not provided.

properties.name: cloudinary.enabled
properties.description: Enable Cloudinary for image uploads. When false, files are stored locally.

properties.name: cloudinary.url
properties.description: Full Cloudinary connection URL of the form cloudinary://<api_key>:<api_secret>@<cloud_name>.

properties.name: cloudinary.folder
properties.description: Default folder path under Cloudinary to store images.
